Metadata.Title: CVE-2024-2905 affecting package rpm-ostree for versions less than 2024.4-3
Metadata.Description: CVE-2024-2905 affecting package rpm-ostree for versions less than 2024.4-3. A patched version of the package is available.

Criterion.Comment: Package rpm-ostree is earlier than 2024.4-3, affected by CVE-2024-2905
